name: Gray’s Crossing Golf Course
description: Truckee’s Gray’s Crossing is a scenic high-Sierra golf course, popular with groups and tournaments.

faqs.question: What’s included in Gray’s Crossing golf group packages?
faqs.answer: Lodging, guaranteed tee times at Gray’s Crossing, carts, and concierge planning. Optional transportation and dining available.

faqs.question: How much do Gray’s Crossing packages cost?
faqs.answer: Typical range is $189–$429 per golfer depending on dates, lodging, and group size.

faqs.question: Do you organize corporate and tournament groups?
faqs.answer: Yes—room blocks, tee-time reservations, tournament setup, and executive event planning.

meta.title: Gray’s Crossing Golf | Truckee Golf Groups & Stay and Play
meta.description: Book Gray’s Crossing in Truckee with golf groups, tee times, and stay and play packages. Custom trips for buddies, corporate, and leisure groups.
